title: 3xl buzzing when plugged in
content:
When I plug my phone in it starting buzzing every second. I unplugged it and turned the connector the other way and it stopped and just charged regularly.
My wife has the same phone so I tried her phone on the charger but it worked correctly both ways.
I then took my phone to my wife's charger and I get the same thing, buzz buzz buzz one way and when I turn it it charges correctly.

This is weird.

Any help of understanding would be appreciated.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
